-$5.00/Month 
-768 MB RAM

-1000 GB Bandwidth Transfer 
-100 Mbit Port Speed

Order [here](http://webline-services.com/landing/openvz-vps.html?campaign=lowendbox) to receive 15% recurring now!

Each OpenVZ Cheap VPS plan includes:

•Support via Live Chat, and Ticket System

We have our own datacenters in NY and newly launched datacenter in Dallas!
